title: XRd Helm Chart Values
description: Configuration values for XRd helm charts

enabled.description: Allow this chart to be used as an optional subchart

global.description: Global settings used by XRd definitions

nameOverride.description: Override the basename used when naming generated resources

fullnameOverride.description: Override the full name used when naming generated resources

repository.description: Repository to pull the image from (required)

tag.description: Image tag to pull from the repository (required)

labels.description: Labels added to the XRd deployment

annotations.description: Annotations added to the XRd deployment

serviceAccountName.description: Name of the service account to use for the XRd pod

hostNetwork.description: Flag indicating whether or not to use the host's network namespace

podLabels.description: Labels added to the XRd pod

podAnnotations.description: Annotations added to the XRd pod

username.description: Username of a root user to add to the XR configuration

password.description: Password for the root user (plaintext). Must be set if username is set

asciiEveryBoot.description: Flag indicating if the ASCII configuration should be applied on every boot (true), or just first boot (false)

scriptEveryBoot.description: Flag indicating if the boot script should be run on every boot (true), or just first boot (false)

ztpEnable.description: Flag indicating if ZTP should be enabled

ztpIni.description: Contents of a custom ZTP ini file to use. May only be set when ztpEnable is specified

size.description: Size of the persistent storage volume

storageClass.description: Storage class for the persistent volume

existingVolume.description: Use an existing Persistent Volume which must be created manually

selector.description: Selector label query for the PVC

existingClaim.description: Use an existing Persistent Volume Claim which must be created manually

extraVolumes.description: Extra volumes for the XRd pod

extraVolumeMounts.description: Extra volume mounts for the XRd container

extraHostPathMounts.description: Extra hostpath mounts for the XRd container

item.description: Information for a single host mount

name.description: Unique name for the host mount

hostPath.description: Path on the host to mount in the container

mountPath.description: Path in the container mount the host directory

create.description: Flag indicating whether or not to create the directory if it's missing on the host

type.description: Underlying interface type. One of: 'defaultCni', 'multus' or 'sriov'

attachmentConfig.description: Network attachment annotation configuration, for multus-type interfaces only

resource.description: SR-IOV resource-pool name, for sriov-type interfaces only

snoopIpv4Address.description: Indicate whether to snoop the pre-existing IPv4 address of the interface into XR config

snoopIpv4DefaultRoute.description: Indicate whether snoop the pre-existing IPv4 default route of the interface into XR config

snoopIpv6Address.description: Flag indicating whether to snoop the pre-existing IPv6 address of the interface into XR config

snoopIpv6DefaultRoute.description: Flag indicating whether to snoop the pre-existing IPv6 default route of the interface into XR config

chksum.description: Flag indicating whether TCP/UDP checksums must be calculated for XRd for ingress packets to counteract checksum offload

xrName.description: Customize the XR interface name for this interface

type.description: Underlying interface type. One of: 'defaultCni', 'multus' or 'sriov'

attachmentConfig.description: Network attachment annotation configuration, for multus-type interfaces only

resource.description: SR-IOV resource-pool name, for sriov-type interfaces only

snoopIpv4Address.description: Indicate whether to snoop the pre-existing IPv4 address of the interface into XR config

snoopIpv4DefaultRoute.description: Indicate whether snoop the pre-existing IPv4 default route of the interface into XR config

snoopIpv6Address.description: Flag indicating whether to snoop the pre-existing IPv6 address of the interface into XR config

snoopIpv6DefaultRoute.description: Flag indicating whether to snoop the pre-existing IPv6 default route of the interface into XR config

chksum.description: Flag indicating whether TCP/UDP checksums must be calculated for XRd for ingress packets to counteract checksum offload

xrName.description: Customize the XR interface name for this interface

advancedSettings.description: Advanced settings for XRd not required for normal deployments
advancedSettings.$comment: XRd environment variables copied verbatim into the container environment

xrd-common.description: Dummy placeholder for xrd-common subchart settings (never used)
